ValidationRule.description: Ensures that user can only progress to the next stage which is Executed or Discontinue.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName ='International_Projects_Unit', ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(StageName ), 'Contract'), NOT(ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Executed')), NOT(ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Discontinued')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can only progress the opportunity to next stage i.e. Executed or Discontinued.
